The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, annoyed, or stressed you can see his finger tips go white. The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. I saw it tonight and fell asleep in the movie.

That is something that I have not done since - I have never fallen asleep at a real movie in the theater. I usually prefer to watch after we have it taped and watch it in the comfort of our home -- no interruptions. That is the thing that happened to me. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. The movie is pale by comparison to My Life as a Zucchini.
My Life as a Zucchini is a movie with beautiful drawings by a pretty traditional plot. Brother's relationship between siblings, hate between siblings are the main theme here. But this movie has found a way to revisit the story and provides a different look

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures across the Universe in their space ships, along with their pets, the felines. A few heavily armed groups survive on the Earth continent of Africa. Yet, the wild feral cats are affected by the depleted and dying radioactive sun.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is the first of three in the series.
